quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love.
author: Rumi

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi

quote: Don’t get lost in your pain. Know that one day your pain will become your cure.
author: Rumi

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: The garden of the world has no limits except in your mind.
author: Rumi

quote: Try to accept the changing seasons of your heart, even as you have always accepted the seasons changing over your fields.
author: Rumi

quote: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop.
author: Rumi

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
author: Rumi

quote: Be like melting snow — wash yourself of yourself.
author: Rumi

quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit.
author: Rumi

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

quote: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.
author: Rumi

quote: When you let go of who you are, you become who you might be.
author: Rumi

quote: Ignore those that make you fearful and sad, that degrade you back towards disease and death.
author: Rumi

quote: Don’t get lost in your pain; know that one day your pain will become your cure.
author: Rumi

quote: Be like a sun for love, a mirror for compassion, a waterfall of charity.
author: Rumi

quote: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.
author: Rumi
